author: Ethel Detch
text:
I work for a state government research agency.  We are looking for a book or publication that would provide a basic state-to-state comparison of local government structures and their authority (cities, counties, townships, burroughs, etc.)  If you are aware of anything like that, please let me know.  Thank you. 
Ethel Detch
ethel.detch@tn.gov
title: Local Government Structures
